title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the difference quotient

1 point is earned for the answer

g(7)−g(3) 7−(−3) = 3 2 − 15 2 10 =− 3 5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4C70@
descriptions:

1 point is earned for the difference quotient

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the answer
